full_text:
Re: Media inquiry - due 3 pm - USA Today - re: monitoring video of suicide-risk IMs in segregated housing
From Hugh Hurwitz
To [redacted]
Date 2019/10/22 13:08
Subject: Re: Media inquiry - due 3 pm - USA Today - re: monitoring video of suicide-risk IMs in segregated housing
Attachments: TEXT.htm
This question is NOT about suicide watch. It should be referred to CPD.
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From: [redacted] @bop.gov
Date: 10/22/19 12:46 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [redacted] @bop.gov, Hugh Hurwitz [redacted] @bop.gov
Subject: Fwd: Media inquiry - due 3 pm - USA Today - re: monitoring video of suicide-risk IMs in segregated housing
FYI Hugh and [redacted]
The reporter now says his deadline is 3 pm, so I'll need to take this to IPPA leadership as soon as you return and review this.
[redacted]
Thanks,
[redacted]

text_blocks.content: Re: Media inquiry - due 3 pm - USA Today - re: monitoring video of suicide-risk IMs in segregated housing
Subject: Re: Media inquiry - due 3 pm - USA Today - re: monitoring video of suicide-risk IMs in segregated housing
This question is NOT about suicide watch. It should be referred to CPD.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
Subject: Fwd: Media inquiry - due 3 pm - USA Today - re: monitoring video of suicide-risk IMs in segregated housing
The reporter now says his deadline is 3 pm, so I'll need to take this to IPPA leadership as soon as you return and review this.

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content appears to be related to a media inquiry regarding monitoring videos of suicide-risk inmates in segregated housing.
